service.title: JSON Merge Patch
service.documentation: This specification defines the JSON merge patch format and processing rules. The merge patch format is primarily intended for use with the HTTP PATCH method as a means of describing a set of modifications to a target resource's content.

media-type.documentation: The merge patch format is primarily intended for use with the HTTP PATCH method as a means of describing a set of modifications to a target resource's content. A JSON merge patch document describes changes to be made to a target JSON document using a syntax that closely mimics the document being modified.
